subject: Basketball
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Delonte West is returning to the Boston Celtics. West, a 6-foot-3 guard, was suspended for the first 10 games of the 2010-11 season after pleading guilty to weapons charges in Maryland.
snippet: Delonte West is returning to the Boston Celtics. West, a 6-foot-3 guard, was suspended for the first 10 games of the 2010-11 season after pleading guilty to weapons charges in Maryland.
